name: Street Caretaker
description:
Game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #6  (theme: take care)

You have to take care of those careless people walking around, who can't even safely cross the street

Controls:
WASD / arrows    to walk
E    to interact
pretty easy, right?


Note:

I messed up some settings in Godot so game may not work on older computers, and downloadable versions didn't work so I deleted them.

I will fix this as soon as the voting ends
